A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie looks good\, and is entertaining enough to watch once. However\, as a Star Wars film\, this movie shits all over the original trilogy and characters\, is filled with the most blatant\, inexcusable plot holes\, and just generally fails in every way that it should have excelled.\nKathleen Kennedy\, and Ryan Johnson should both be summarily fired and blacklisted from Hollywood for allowing this monstrosity of leftist propaganda to be released to the public.
